name: Turret Typer - v0.1 - Beta
description:
A simple game using your keyboard!

Type in the commands with your keyboard to control the turret and blast away blocks!

Check out the mission guides on each of the 3 levels to know the objectives.

n.b. don't read the below, the WebGL version of it has a bug :(

Can you find that one easter egg code in this game! (sadly it doesn't do anything, haven't decided what I want it to do yet...)

(p.s. in case you 'furry animals' are Falcon what the code is, the code is related to a Nintendo 64 game, Fox I'd Slippy in this hint for you, Pepper than telling you the code outright. Good luck!)
